context11: The bomb shelter was filling up, but I made sure my grand piano got a spot.
context12: What prompted you to put a grand piano in a bomb shelter?
context13: My piano comes first, so it can stay.
context14: Making sure that your piano has a place in a bomb shelter dislocates people and says that things are more important to you than human beings. Focus on the well being of others, not your own.
context15: The whole point of a bomb shelter is to protect objects that are meant for human endeavors, right?
socialnorm1: It's not okay to put possessions ahead of people.

Title: Select a conversation and write what you would say in the given situation
